meanings.definition: A device that receives and displays messages or notifications.
meanings.sent1: My dad uses pagers at work to get important messages.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff carry pagers to stay updated on patient needs.
meanings.sent3: The pagers beeped so loudly, it sounded like a tiny robot orchestra!
meanings.sent4: The pagers in the office hummed like a chorus of tiny electronic bees.
meanings.sent5: The bright screen of the pagers lit up with urgent messages, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: To send a message to someone using a pager.
meanings.sent1: I pagers my friend to meet me at the park after school.
meanings.sent2: She pagers her team members when there's an emergency at the construction site.
meanings.sent3: He pagers his cat to remind her it's dinner time, but she never responds.
meanings.sent4: The wind pagers the leaves across the yard, whispering secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent5: The music pagers the audience, making them tap their feet and clap along.
